data.eml:eml: First record and establishment of Branchiomma coheni (Polychaeta: Sabellidae) in the Atlantic Ocean and review of non – indigenous species of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Keppel, Erica, Tovar, Maria Ana, Ruiz, Gregory (2015): First record and establishment of Branchiomma coheni (Polychaeta: Sabellidae) in the Atlantic Ocean and review of non – indigenous species of the genus. Zootaxa 4058 (4): 499-518, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4058.4.3
